# Intro
Obter o layout da rede no RedeR
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(igraph)
library(magrittr)

library(Hmisc)
library(ggplot2)
library(scatterpie)
# library(UpSetR)
```

# Dados
```{r rows.print=5}
data(
  gene_ids,
  pathway_neuroexclusivity,
  string_edgelist,
  layout,
  package = "neurotransmission"
)
```

# RedeR
```{r}
vertices <- gene_ids %>%
  na.omit %>%
  inner_join(pathway_neuroexclusivity) %>%
  select(name = string_id, pathway_neuroexclusivity)

# adapting to d3
# vertices %<>% mutate(id = string_id)
string_edgelist %<>% rename(source = stringId_A, target = stringId_B)

g <- graph_from_data_frame(string_edgelist, directed = F, vertices = vertices)

subgraphs <- decompose.graph(g)
lcc_index <- which.max(sapply(subgraphs, vcount))
lcc <- subgraphs[[lcc_index]]

V(lcc)$x <- layout[, 1]
V(lcc)$y <- -layout[, 2]
```

# Force
```{r echo=T, eval=T, include=FALSE}
pajek_nodes <- igraph::as_data_frame(lcc, what = "vertices") %>%
  select(name, signal = pathway_neuroexclusivity, x, y)

pajek_edges <- igraph::as_data_frame(lcc, what = "edges")

range(pajek_nodes$x) %>% print
range(pajek_nodes$y) %>% print

hack <- tribble(
  ~name, ~signal, ~x,   ~y,
  "bot", 0,       -200, -700,
  "top", 0,       400, -200,
)

pajek_nodes %<>% bind_rows(hack) %>% mutate(id = row_number())
```

# Output
```{r}
write("*edges", file="kegg.net")
write_tsv(pajek_edges, "kegg.net", append = TRUE, col_names = FALSE, quote_escape = F)
write("*nodes", file="kegg.net", append = TRUE)
write_tsv(pajek_nodes %>% select(name, x, y), "kegg.net", append = TRUE, col_names = FALSE, quote_escape = F)


write_tsv(pajek_nodes %>% select(id, name, signal), "kegg.dat")
```
